pages.text: $(bgreen)Gloom Shroom$() always enjoyed releasing heavy fumes. A lot of people aren't cool with that. They say it's rude or that it smells bad. All he can say is, would you rather have your brain eaten by zombies?$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)175$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)short range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)Fume$() $(l)in an area around$() it every 0.4 second to attack enemy.
$(bpurple)Special : $()Fume can $()hits through all enemies$(). $(bred)It will sleep at daytime$().$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)Fume each tick$() which last several seconds.
